title: low priority queue
body:
i was just wondering and I came up with some good solutions to dodgers and afkers
please tell me which you think is best and be sure to let me know If they are good!

1.  for every afk player on the team the surrender at 20 minutes is decreased by five minutes.
e.g 1 person has just disconnected on your team so its now a 4v5 so I was thinking instead of waitng 20 minutes for a guaranteed loss if goes down by 5 minutes so the surrender time is 15 minutes and 2 afk players decrease the time by five so then its ten minutes and so on.
this will make players not have to wait 20 minutes for a game they know they've lost while they could be 5-10 minutes into a new game.

****
2. when a player dodges or afks their next couple of games after low priority queue 5 games are chosen s that the dodgers next couple of games he/she is placed with lower level summoners of other summoners who have gone very bad in their last couple of games so that they know how it feels to have someone who costs them a game.

so these are my opinions some of you may not agree but let me know what you think in the comments and share this so maybe a  rioter sees it 

thanks so much everyone :D{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
